commands.name: az image builder trigger create
commands.summary: Create a trigger for the specified virtual machine image template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder trigger create --image-template-name
                                --name
                                --resource-group
                                [--kind {SourceImage}]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az image builder trigger create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --image-template-name MyImageTemplate --trigger-name MyTrigger

commands.name: az image builder trigger delete
commands.summary: Delete a trigger for the specified virtual machine image template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder trigger delete [--ids]
                                [--image-template-name]
                                [--name]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--subscription]
                                [--yes]

commands.name: az image builder trigger list
commands.summary: List all triggers for the specified Image Template resource.

commands.name: az image builder trigger show
commands.summary: Get the specified trigger for the specified image template resource.

commands.name: az image builder trigger wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
